title: Ep 153: Hitting The Road With A Food Smock
itunes:title: Ep 153: Hitting The Road With A Food Smock
itunes:subtitle: I am so nervous to tell you guys this.
description:
I am nervous to share with you that we’re talking about car things again. 

 

I think this makes three episodes where car things have come up, but Sally is going on a Road Trip (capitalization for formality) in October and we thought it was appropriate to bring up some car things. But I know Gee Thanks-heads who are loyal listeners will be like “REALLY, CAR GARBAGES AGAIN, CAROLINE?” but look, we don’t go through life CHOOSING our passions, okay? We are born this way. Or at least, I am.

 

But I do bring up some new ideas like a food eating sweatshirt. The Real John Max will be helping me patent. Don’t even try!

 

Mentioned on the show:

  • The Slime Tire Air Pressure Thing (Capitalization Formality): https://amzn.to/3DwTlrl 
  • Car Garbage: https://amzn.to/3qHVtoP 
  • Foldable Packable Duffel Bag for Laundry: https://amzn.to/3RRju8R 
  • Portable Clothes Line: https://amzn.to/3Ul917o 
  • Microfiber Towels: https://amzn.to/3eXkQjO
